name: @cerebruminc/yates
description: Role based access control for Prisma Apps

scripts.generate: prisma generate --schema prisma/primary/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema prisma/secondary/schema.prisma
scripts.test:compose:integration: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile with-sut up db sut --exit-code-from sut
scripts.setup: prisma generate --schema prisma/primary/schema.prisma && prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/primary/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema prisma/secondary/schema.prisma && prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/secondary/schema.prisma

author: Cerebrum <hello@cerebrum.com> (https://cerebrum.com)
